about.metaDescription: Learn about ThinkForward AI, our mission, values, and the team behind our innovative immigration consulting platform.
about.heroSubtitle: We're on a mission to make immigration processes more accessible, efficient, and successful for everyone.
about.missionSubtitle: Why we exist and what drives us forward
about.missionText1: At ThinkForward AI, we believe that everyone deserves access to clear, personalized immigration guidance. Our mission is to democratize immigration consulting by combining human expertise with cutting-edge AI technology.
about.missionText2: We're committed to reducing the complexity, cost, and uncertainty of immigration processes, helping individuals and families navigate their journey with confidence and clarity.
about.missionText3: Our platform bridges the gap between traditional consulting services and self-service options, offering a hybrid approach that delivers the best of both worlds.
about.missionImageAlt: ThinkForward AI team working with clients
about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide our work
about.value1Text: We believe in building trust through transparent processes, clear communication, and honest guidance at every step of the immigration journey.
about.value2Text: We're committed to leveraging technology to make immigration services more accessible, affordable, and efficient for everyone.
about.value3Text: While we embrace AI, we never lose sight of the human element. Our technology enhances rather than replaces the personal touch of expert consultants.
about.contactTitle: Ready to Start Your Immigration Journey?
about.contactText: Schedule a consultation with one of our immigration experts and discover how ThinkForward AI can help you achieve your immigration goals.

pricing.metaDescription: Explore ThinkForward AI's pricing plans and find the right immigration consulting package for your needs.
pricing.heroSubtitle: Choose the plan that works best for your immigration journey.
pricing.plansSubtitle: Select the option that best fits your needs
pricing.basicDescription: Essential tools for individuals starting their immigration journey
pricing.professionalDescription: Advanced features for families and professionals seeking comprehensive support
pricing.enterpriseDescription: Complete solution for complex cases requiring maximum support
pricing.professionalFeature3: Advanced form filling for all applications
pricing.customDescription: Contact our sales team to discuss enterprise plans or custom solutions for agencies and large organizations.
pricing.comparisonSubtitle: See which plan is right for you
pricing.faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our pricing and plans
pricing.faq1Answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. If you upgrade, you'll be charged the prorated difference. If you downgrade, the new rate will apply at the start of your next billing cycle.
pricing.faq2Question: Is there a free trial available?
pricing.faq2Answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial of our Professional plan so you can experience the full benefits before committing.
pricing.faq3Question: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.faq3Answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans.
pricing.faq4Answer: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your payment information.
pricing.faq5Answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with our service.
pricing.ctaTitle: Ready to Start Your Immigration Journey?
pricing.ctaText: Choose a plan that fits your needs and take the first step toward your immigration goals.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: View your immigration progress and next steps.

modeSwitcher.title: Profile Collection Mode
modeSwitcher.conversationDescription: Collect your information through natural conversation, more relaxed and natural.
modeSwitcher.formDescription: Fill in your information through structured forms, more systematic and comprehensive.

startPage.title: Start Your Immigration Assessment
startPage.metaDescription: Begin your personalized immigration eligibility assessment with ThinkForward AI's intelligent assessment tool.
startPage.description: Our assessment will analyze your profile and identify the best immigration pathways for you. Choose the type of assessment that best fits your needs.
startPage.disclaimer: Your answers are confidential and will be used only to provide personalized immigration guidance.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Assessment
comprehensive.description: A detailed evaluation of your eligibility for all available immigration programs.

express.title: Express Assessment
express.description: A quick evaluation focused on the most common immigration pathways.

targeted.title: Targeted Assessment
targeted.description: An assessment focused on a specific immigration program or country.

step1.title: Answer Questions
step1.description: Provide information about your education, work experience, language skills, and other relevant factors.

step2.title: Get Your Results
step2.description: Our AI analyzes your profile and calculates your eligibility scores for various immigration programs.

step3.title: Explore Options
step3.description: Review your results and explore recommended immigration pathways tailored to your profile.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: Our assessment uses the latest immigration criteria and is regularly updated to reflect policy changes. While highly accurate, it's meant as a guide and not a guarantee of acceptance.
faq.question2: Can I save my assessment and continue later?
faq.answer2: Yes, you can save your progress at any time and return to complete your assessment later.
faq.question3: How long are my assessment results valid?
faq.answer3: Your results are valid for 6 months. After that, we recommend taking a new assessment as immigration policies and your personal circumstances may have changed.
faq.question4: Can I assess eligibility for multiple countries?
faq.answer4: Yes, our comprehensive assessment evaluates your eligibility for multiple countries and programs simultaneously.
faq.question5: What happens after I complete the assessment?
faq.answer5: You'll receive a detailed report with your eligibility scores, recommended pathways, and next steps. You can also book a consultation with an immigration expert to discuss your results.
